SELECT NEWS_NO, TITLE, LINK, PUBDATE, DESCRIPTION, IMAGE, CATEGORY FROM NEWS WHERE 1=1
AND CATEGORY LIKE '%'||#{category}||'%'
AND TITLE LIKE '%'||#{titleKeyword}||'%'
AND description LIKE '%'||#{descriptionKeyword}||'%'
ORDER BY NEWS_NO
ORDER BY PUBDATE ASC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM NEWS WHERE 1=1
AND CATEGORY LIKE '%'||#{category}||'%'
AND TITLE LIKE '%'||#{titleKeyword}||'%'
AND description LIKE '%'||#{descriptionKeyword}||'%'

SELECT N.NEWS_NO, N.TITLE, N.LINK, N.PUBDATE, N.DESCRIPTION, N.IMAGE, N.CATEGORY, NR.N_REPLY_NO AS R_N_REPLY_NO, NR.N_REPLY_CONTENT AS R_N_REPLY_CONTENT, NR.NEWS_NO AS R_NEWS_NO, NR.N_WRITER_NO AS R_N_REPLY_WRITER_NO, U.USER_ID AS R_USER_ID, U.USER_NICKNAME AS R_N_USER_NICKNAME, NR.N_REPLY_REGISTER AS R_N_REPLY_REGISTER, NR.N_REPLY_MODIFY AS R_N_REPLY_MODIFY, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM NEWS_REPLY NR WHERE N.NEWS_NO = NR.NEWS_NO ) AS REPLY_CNT FROM NEWS N LEFT OUTER JOIN NEWS_REPLY NR ON(N.NEWS_NO = NR.NEWS_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_T U ON(NR.N_WRITER_NO = U.USER_NO) WHERE N.NEWS_NO = #{newsNo} ORDER BY NR.N_REPLY_REGISTER ASC
SELECT ROWNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT NEWS_NO, TITLE, PUBDATE, DESCRIPTION, IMAGE, CATEGORY FROM NEWS WHERE ROWNUM <= 5 ORDER BY NEWS_NO DESC ) A

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT NEWS_NO, TITLE, PUBDATE, IMAGE, CATEGORY FROM NEWS WHERE CATEGORY = 'politics' AND IMAGE IS NOT NULL ORDER BY PUBDATE DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 1
UNION ALL
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT NEWS_NO, TITLE, PUBDATE, IMAGE, CATEGORY FROM NEWS WHERE CATEGORY = 'economy' AND IMAGE IS NOT NULL ORDER BY PUBDATE DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 1
UNION ALL
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT NEWS_NO, TITLE, PUBDATE, IMAGE, CATEGORY FROM NEWS WHERE CATEGORY = 'opinion' AND IMAGE IS NOT NULL ORDER BY PUBDATE DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 1
UNION ALL
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT NEWS_NO, TITLE, PUBDATE, IMAGE, CATEGORY FROM NEWS WHERE CATEGORY = 'national' AND IMAGE IS NOT NULL ORDER BY PUBDATE DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 1;
